definition[0]: the best, most important, or most successful person or thing in a group
example[0]: Until his marriage, his job was number one in his life.
example[1]: Shearson is number one in the market this year.
definition[1]: the musical record that is the most popular at a particular time
definition[2]: a word meaning urine, used especially with children to avoid saying this
definition[3]: most important or successful in a particular situation
example[4]: The University of Maine has the number one hockey team in the country.
definition[4]: first on a list of several things to be considered, done etc
example[6]: item number one on the agenda
example[7]: This has got to be our number one task.
